```{r}
ratios_per_epoch <- make_df_ratios_per_epoch()

BFs <- c()
for (i in 1:(length(ratios_per_epoch)-1)) {
    epoch1 <- ratios_per_epoch[, i]
    epoch2 <- ratios_per_epoch[, i + 1]
    res <- ttestBF(epoch1, epoch2)
    BF <- extractBF(res, onlybf = TRUE)
    BFs <- append(BFs, BF)
}
BFs
```
